'''Animula Choragi''' is [[Furina]]'s [[Constellation]].

==Gameplay==
{{Constellation Table|Furina}}

==Trivia==
* All of Furina's constellations are named after lines or songs from famous operas; her C1 is an aria from ''{{w|Carmen}}'', her C2 is a translated line from "{{w|La donna è mobile}}" from ''{{w|Rigoletto}}'', her C3 and C5 are lines from ''{{w|Turandot}}'', her C4 is a line from ''{{w|Orpheus in the Underworld|Orphèe aux Enfers}}'', and her C6 is a duet from ''{{w|La traviata#Act 1|La traviata}}.''
